questions.quote: Uh, I don't know. Ya see, it's just, see I was a regular on a soap opera y'know? And to go from that to this, I just... Plus, I'd have to wait on all my friends.
If you like looking at butts so much why don't you just go look at a mirror?
Oh, come on, miss, isn't there any way that you can just let me off...
Okay, then y'know what? Help me! I need help! I can't do this!
Yeah, we took a little stroll in the park and no one was around, so...
Well. Sounds like you're writing yourself a little play there Rach. Wow! Let me know how that one turns out.
Well, you've been here for two months now and your boss is required to hand in a performance evaluation. But y'know, there is one thing that I have yet to evaluate.
FINE, ok, if you love this house so much, then you should just live here, okay? I just hope you get used to that weird humming sound. Hmmmmmmmmmmmmmm...
Give her a break, it's hard being on your own for the first time.
Huh, Rach I got to say it's gonna take a lot of money for me to go out on a date with a dude.
